title: S
clause_text: S.R.A. shall be included in the slum rehabilitation scheme (S.R.S.) in the relevant final plot of the Town Planning Scheme.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
